results.content: This is the best course I've come across for NgRx. The instructor explains things very clearly and thoroughly, and moves at a very reasonable pace. Highly recommend.
results.content_html: This is the best course I've come across for NgRx. The instructor explains things very clearly and thoroughly, and moves at a very reasonable pace. Highly recommend.

results.content: Great course. The instructore does not reference any of the websites for Redux, RxJs or NgRx and awsumes you have some knowledge. The course douse help you understand the difference between Redux, RxJs and NgRx. I did enjoyed "Building your own NgRx" section as it help me understand the concept behind Redux and NgRx. Overall a great course.

results.content:
I can't recommend this course to anyone. It's the hardiest course that I passed on Udemy. But hardness caused not only by topic, but mostly by feed. The main problem is the way how author writes code it's really confuse and editor extension makes it even worse. In last sections he stopped to even try and start to paste pre-maded solution. A huge part of each video is given to "now we will learn", "in this video we learned" and even "next video we will learn". Sound could be much better with $50 usb mic.
This course useful only as list of things that you need to google about. 
I don't like to make a reviews like that, but last drop was broken test's.

results.content: Expected more knowledge sharing from instructor. Way of teaching is very poor. Instructor doesn't show any interest of sharing knowledge, rather he just want to deliver content.

results.content: After lot a research i decided to take this course to learn RxJs & NgRx but this course totally disappointed me. the example codes are not written well no any sequence or pattern to write codes just they wrote any where like code files look like garbage. even this course make me more confuse about Rxjs & NgRx.
